AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fangleader candidate
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a highly regarded Stormvermin. Cunning, ruthless and ambitious.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: loyalist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has completely dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to the stormvermin. [PAWN_pronoun] is a true, trained loyalist; at least, as true a trained loyalist as any skaven can be.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gladiator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] often fought in the arena. There was no greater joy in [PAWN_possessive] life than the thrill of battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: eshin triad
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of Clan Eshin's black-furred Elite. Well-drilled and deadly, [PAWN_pronoun] combines the brawn of a black-fur with the speed and cunning of a Gutter Runner.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: rictus deathvermin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] belongs to perhaps one of the most formidable and proficient warrior castes in all of Skavendom, the Deathvermin of Clan Rictus. Such is their reputation that they have never lost a battle, even surviving barely-veiled suicide missioned issued by the warlords of Clan Rictus.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: red guard of Mors
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: The Red Guard are the claw-picked elites of Clan Mors, chosen by Queek Headtaker himself. Being a part of the Red Guard ensured that [PAWN_nameDef] was given the best arms, armour, and feeding rights of all troops under the Headtaker's command.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plaguevermin
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was among the elite Stormvermin ranks of Clan Septik, one of the thrall clans of Pestilens. [PAWN_pronoun] enhances [PAWN_possessive] physical strength as a black-fur with the grotesque resilience often seen in the most zealous of Plague Monks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: albino guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was part of one of the exceedingly rare members of Skavendom's most disciplined military force, the Albino Guard. Taken from birth due to [PAWN_possessive] albino colouration, and trained by the Council Of Thirteen to be near incorruptible and loyal bodyguards.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: unknown birth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Where [PAWN_nameDef] was birthed, or where [PAWN_pronoun] came from is unknown. Seemingly out of nowhere [PAWN_pronoun] stood with the rest of the Stormvermin candidates.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ruthless
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was extra ruthless. All the other skaven have always been lesser kinds to [PAWN_objective]. Nothing will stop [PAWN_nameDef] from obstaining the goals of the moment, and getting where [PAWN_pronoun] wants to be.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lowborn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was lowborn, but destiny intervened, and allowed that [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in with the other Stormvermin candidates.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clan born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a clan, taken from birth to fullfil [PAWN_possessive] destiny as a Stormvermin.
